content: Never stop writing! A person can make a career of getting a first work published and, of course, if you ignore working on getting a book published, you’re, alas, dead in the water. On the other hand, if I had spent “years and years” with my first “work” in order to get it published, shopping it around, doing elevator pitches, I would not have gone on to write addition stuff, all of which was better that the first thing I wrote. WIBOW!
